description:
Population Raster Vanuatu 2020

Data Input: Household locations from 2016 Population and Housing Census conducted using Survey Solutions CAPI (Computer Assisted Personal Interview). 
Year Population Growth Rate of 2.3% has been applied to update population up to 2020

Household locations vector layer has been transformed into a 100m resolution raster.
name: Vanuatu_Population_Grid_2020
